duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform physical labor using hand tools and equipment for the construction and maintenance of railway tracks and structures.
Maintain bridges and associated structures around the bridges.
Carry and place track materials using hand tools such as tie tongs, rail tongs, etc.
Remove and install railroad crossties and connect/disconnect rail using specialized tools.
Move, clean, and tamp ballast with shovels, picks, and forks.
Assist in safety meetings and wear appropriate personal protective equipment.
